author: sb:ez.no
msg: Use PHPUnit 3's assertArrayHasKey() method. According to the Code Coverage report, no test in the eZ components test suite uses code from the MockObject (Jan Borsodi's original implementation of Mock Objects that has been merged into PHPUnit 3 CVS since) component anymore.
